DESCRIPTION: Make sure the first element in NAMES has no underscores. The rest should use _ in the place of spaces. In card text, you'll use the underscore versions.

This card activates effects that relate to Combat Arts.
This card uses your current weapon as its type, boosting or nerfing its effects based on weapon-triangle effects. Auto-applies Magic to appropriate weapon types.
This costs 1 less if the weapon used matches that on the card. Otherwise, set your weapon to a type stated on the card.
The next time you take Attack damage, deal X damage back. NL A weapon-weak Attack only halves your Deflect.
